description: This Fleece Plus Hoody for men will keep you snug and warm thanks to the merino wool on the inside and outside. The Merino Fleece Plus line is shaped by our mulesing-free merino wool from Tasmania. Recycled polyester is woven into the inside of the main material in addition to fine merino wool, which makes our Fleece Plus Hoody for men particularly sustainable.
name: Ortovox Fleece Plus Hoody - Mens
